wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Masters (1919 – 10 May 1990) was a British production designer and set decorator. He was nominated for an Academy Award in the category Best Art Direction for the film 2001: A Space Odyssey.He was married to actress Heather Sears from 1957 until his death.
